Review.Contenu: Roccat your f**king stupid. I have installed the roccat swarm software and it destroyed my roccat mouse. It no longer works. If i connect it to my pc the mouse doesnt have a LED light and wont work AT ALL. Roccat you all are i*diots. Fix your dumb mouse and your dumb software. Worst mouse software ever. kys

Review.Titre: I will never buy roccat again
Review.Contenu: The most expensive headset I've bought, but also the worst. Fortunately, thanks to the warranty, this is the fourth headset I've received because I have to contact support every 4 to 6 months for, and you better laugh at this, four different major issues. The software shows a battery pop-up at 10%, but the headset shuts down in less than 10 seconds. The keyboard types double letters, of course, shortly after the warranty expires. The only things I have no complaints about are the mouse and the mousepad! Obviously, I do not recommend it, and I won't be choosing ROCCAT for my next setup. On the other hand, the customer support is responsive and efficient.

I bought a ROCCAT Vulcan 121 AIMO 2 years ago so it's sadly out of warranty, the keyboard started having issues with some keys few months ago and now it's borderline unusable. The keys in question either don't work or they double type. Searching online, it seems like a common problem with the products of this company, avoid their products.

1st Purchase - May 2019 (amazon)What - ROCCAT Vulcan 100 Issue: Often used keys non responsive or double presses when tapping it repeatedly to get it to workRMA request - Jan 2021Refunded and purchased like for like at another store (box.co.uk) - Jan 2021Issue: exactly same issue as first keyboard. RMA request - May 2022Poor quality of keyboards.

Review.Titre: Kone Pro Air scroll wheel is trash.
Review.Contenu: My Kone Pro Air scroll wheel developed that common problem where it scrolls the wrong way frequently. After jumping through many hoops, I was able to secure a replacement from Roccat. Now, just months later, my replacement has the same problem. These are trash mice and Roccat knows it, but they keep selling them anyway.

Contact support to get help with their Roccat Swarm stuff which is IMPOSSIBLE to delete as the unistall.exe doesnt work? Pfff... No way! Those guys didnt answer me in 3!!! Days. Jo, I am getting beeter support buying weed than a Keyboard for 200 Euros.Roccat Kowa mouse- survived literally 1 year than gone for a double click: support says me to ***k off, fine.Well, may be haappens sometimes, or my fingers are just to strong BUTRoccat Aimo mouse - half a year, the same story as with Kova.Well, if you are are 12 years kid clicking minecraft, Roccat is your choice. If you prefer something what is able to survive MANs regular click playing FPS games = NEVER BUY THIS OVERPRISED TRASH. Even Chineese stuff for 15 bucks lasted longer than this beatiful and useless s**t.

I bought the Kone Pure Ultra from their website , but quickly realized the shape doesn't suit me an revoked my purchase the day afterFirst: I didn't even get an receipt, klicked on the website to request one -IGNORED! two weeks later no receiptWrote an email to support stating I revoke my purchase (you can within 14days) and want to return it-IGNORED! One week later, nothing but a automated responseWrote another email a week later-IGNORED , another automated responseNo telephone number, nothing Thinking now, if I send the mouse back I won't even get my money back with 90% probabilityAntrocious, unprofessional and frankly borderline-criminalNever again ,Roccat

Review.Titre: Just bought Syn Bud Air for 89.99 - Poor Quality even worst longevity.
Review.Contenu: Just bought Syn Bud Air for 89.99, straight out of the box had problems with connecting to PC and Phone but after few hours finally managed, the 20hr battery is a lie cause its only 5 hours which also get drained pretty quick the other 15 is stored in case means you have to take the off and put for another 2.5 to get charged :D the case battery indicatior show 3 light only, there is no display to tell you what % they are charged. One of my Air Buds stop charging completely after 1 month of usage, return to seller and get new pair, they stop charging after second  day :) I can say that for this money the quality should be much better, the case look dull, products on amazon for 19.99 have more options they them. Roccat that was you last chance :D

Useless customer service that just abandon and ignore you if they can't help. Three years I've tried to get my purchase fixed. Such a strange company, their software and support forums seem to have been abandoned years ago yet they still bring out new products?

I've bought a a few products over the years, and in general I liked them. However, I've purchased two mice from roccat, both of them having failures after about a year of use. The first one, the sensor for the mouse positioning gave out, customer service just suggested I clean it then told me I was SOL. second mouse, figured maybe that one was a fluke. It was not. Again, a year in, this time the middle mouse button gave out. Talked to customer service, told me I would have to destroy the mouse's cord before they'd even consider sending a replacement, and that after I got approved, it would be 2 weeks before I got the replacement. I don't have any backup mice, so I would have to go buy a replacement to wait for my replacement. Completely absurd.

Review.Titre: Expected more from 'Germanys leading Peripherals manufacturer'
Review.Contenu: Bought my mouse 2 years ago, yesterday it fell down and now the mouse wheel is broken. Asked the support for a spare part or a repair service but apparently both options are out of the question. Now I'll have to buy a new mouse because the mouse wheel in my 100€ Leadr apparently can't be replaced. At least I now know where I won't be buying anymore.

Review.Titre: What a disappointment Elo Never again stay away!!!
Review.Contenu: What a disappointment purchased Elo headphones around 6 months a go. 1 side has broken off retailer I purchased from has shut down. I reached out to Roccat  regarding my issue just to he told and I quote" We do not offer a manufacturer's warranty in Europe and the UK. All claims have to be handled by the retailer.There is nothing we can do in this case.Viele Grüße / Best regards,AnnaTechnical Support" So I'm stuck with expenses headset I can't use nor can get replacement. I initially also purchased mouse and keyboard as I loved quolity of the product and how well it fits. Never again will I purchase any Roccat product not to mention tell my subscribers to stay away from it as when it brakes they will not be covered and end up being stuck with broken product. Very disappointed in this and they do not provide any support. Even tho they have office in UK and Europe.Not happy at all!!!

Review.Titre: Roccat Elo Air 7.1 headset broken firmware
Review.Contenu: Bought Roccat Elo Air 7.1 headset. Connection is lost at least once a week. To get it working again you have to remove dongle, restart and recite prayers and what not, and usually it would start working again. After 6 months it is completely dead. lights up fine, but no sound..Roccat Swarm tells me to update firmware to 1.2.3..i do so, it tells me to update to 1.2.3...keeps telling me the same update is available but installing it changes nothing. This is a cheap china product disguised behind a medium price...stay far away from this amateur company, they havent got a clue as to what they are doing.

Review.Titre: This one star is for product review
Review.Contenu: This one star is for product review. Roocat Synd Buds Air. What a total disappointment. I owned many Roocat mouses and still use them very happy with them as they are perfect fit for my hand. I've decide to get wirless ear buds from you. First pair i got stoped charging after one month of usage, got replacement but unfortunately they also stop working after 2 months, one of buds stop playing sound. No matter what i've tried to fix they don't work. The 20 hrs play time is a marketing grab in real time its only 5 hrs and if you dont use bass boost. The finish quality for £89.99 is poor, they at least could be painted with gloss black. Looking to get wireless headset but we will see.

Ordered a keyboard, 170$ keyboard..the 122. On July 2nd. The same time I ordered a computer to be built. The computer was built and shipped and delivered before the keyboard even made it to usps. When I reached out to customer service(Lola) they said they couldn't cancel my order and they would reach out to usps to see if they had my order. Didn't hear back from them until I messaged again asking for updates.3 weeks later I finally got an update from usps saying the shipment was sent back to the sender because they didn't put my address on the shipment... I tried a 122 roccat keyboard and it feels very cheap. Will be returning my order and never dealing with roccat again.

Absolutely horrible customer support. I really don't know how they can sell products that when they stop working, just stop doing anything about it when they cant fix their own  products. I had 2 brand new keyboards that some of the keys quit working a couple weeks after receiving and very minimal use. So I had to contact support each day thru their support forms before I could even receive a response. When their basic suggested fixes, over just a couple emails, didn't work, they just stopped responding all together. Bumped them a few times with nothing in response. Over priced junk without support. I was able to return 1 of the keyboards, but stuck with a overpriced, broken, useless Roccat keyboard. Also noticed a Roccat mouse I had for a couple years started to not recognize a click. I would have to right click & open files in the menu, but never complained because I don't like dealing with the amount of time it takes with support normally. Went to Alienware & purchased a keyboard & mouse with more suitable functions for cheaper than Roccat's overpriced keyboard.

Review.Titre: great hardware, rendered trash due to soiftware
Review.Contenu: They might make some great hardware. But the software behind things is absolutely garbage. It is attempting to make everything over simplified. but they only achieve to make all special features useless. I have bought a Leadr mouse. This mouse can not be recognised by the software so all extra buttons and all settings are lost. I cant even reinstall the software. and I cant install the module for my mouse alone. There is nothing I can try to do to fix it because there is no control for that. There is a support team, but to be honest they have just suggested things I have already tried. A positive thing was that they replied because my support thread was written in a stage of HUGE frustration. I can not recommend anyone to buy from them. because your product will most likely have frustrating issues that is impossible to deal with.
ryos keyboard £155 with 1c Chinese leds that fail rma every 3 months or buy better, swarm software has multiple problems under windows anniversary update roccat are about as helpful as a statue

Yeah... Roccat. "Designed in Germany, assembled in China." I had 3 Roccat keyboards and SIX (6) Roccat mouses. Every single product had failures after couple of month. They use extremly cheap hardware, and are focussing on the "We produce gaming products" marketing thing. You are looking for quality ? RUN AWAY FROM ROCCAT! The support: They know their products are total garbage. So every time u ask for help or report a broken hardware u will recieve a standard copy&paste answer with driver reset instructions blah blah blah... of course nothing works because their hardware is simply broken. This company exists to rip off people who will fall for the "Designed in Germany" statement (like me). And u will never be able to refund a product, they will just spam u with new hardware which will aswell fail after a couple weeks/month. TOTALLY NOT RECOMMENDED!Mouses: Kone+ (Scrollwheel not usable after 4 months), Tyon(right click failed after couple weeks), and freaking 4 times the Kone AIMO in just 7 months. (first two times scroll wheel broken after couple weeks, second two times left click does not work some times or clicks 3 times in a row on its own... )Keyboards: Isku (lasted the longest time.. but key errors aswell..), Vulcan 120 AIMO ("d" key stopped working after 2 months)big big scam....

Review.Titre: Good products, terrible customer service support.
Review.Contenu: Products are good, Support is f**king terrible. My case isn't just one in a thousand as I've read reviews before and it's apparent they don't care. I bought from their website directly the roccat kone pure ultra around the end of November 2019. Used the mouse for a bit but it had a few issues such as loose buttons, creaky shell, rattly sensor and croaky scrollwheel. I've emailed their customer service to request a refund because then though their website says I can request a refund through my profile on their site, clicking on some shait but it wasn't there. I get an email from someone who's apparently a manager and which wrote I'd be emailed, within "a few hours" two emails, one with shipping label and instructions and another email with some other shait. Next day still no email. OK, i thought it was delayed as it was around December 11 at the time, maybe they're busy with preparing for Christmas. Another week no reply. Now it's about a month since I requested and inquired further through emails about the refund and still nothing. Only the occasional automated reply about them 'receiving my email'. To end this review, I'd say that you should stay away from buying from them directly. Buy from amazon or another site. These guys give 0 Fs about you, and the customer service shows. I doubt I'll be getting my refund, but I have still some little hope. If not they can choke on that £60 I paid for the mouse.

Review.Titre: Bad mouse quality and bad support
Review.Contenu: First, I have to say, that I was a roccat fanboy. I bought everything from them (mouse, keyboard, mousepad, mouse bungee). In 10 years I had 5 mouses. All of them broke because of a known issue. The left mouse button only double clicked. But the support was good. They helped, gave me a replacement if I was in the warranty and were friendly. So I thought, ok maybe they fix the problem with the next product. They don't. Every "Kone Mouse" has the same problem. Don't buy them. This time the roccat support ignored me completly. I've send 2 request. 2 months later I got no answer. I contacted them on twitter. 1 week later, no answer. Now I will never buy anything from them again. They completely let me down. I hope that they will answer me someday.

Review.Titre: I have a Roccat isku fx keyboard with…
Review.Contenu: I have a Roccat isku fx keyboard with about 4 years and it just broke. Some keys don't work. This is a 100$ plus keyboard, this is unacceptable!

Review.Titre: Defective mouse scroll wheel, no support
Review.Contenu: I've been using Roccat products since 2012, including mouse mats, mice and headsets. My First higher-end gaming mouse was a Roccat Savu, which after almost 10 years I replaced with a Roccat Kone AIMO Remastered.I didn't even look online for reviews of this mouse, because I trusted the brand based on my previous experiences. I would very soon find out that this was a terrible mistake, however.Only a few days after having the mouse, I noticed that the scroll wheel would sometimes input a scroll in the opposite direction. At first I thought this was somehow related to it being new, since the issue seemed to become less frequent after using the scroll wheel for a few minutes.However, the issue only became worse, yet I unfortunately neglected to contact Roccat within the warranty period, which in hindsight only shows how disilusioned I was. Now that the warranty is over, the problem is unbearable: for every 9-11 scrolls in one direction, it does an input in the opposite direction. I finally searched online for help and found out that this is a recurrent issue since the launch of the first Kone mice from Roccat, and apparently also common in their other models.I contacted Roccat for help, hoping that they would repair it for a fee, or provide guidance to help me repair it myself. Their answer was that they don't do repairs, that they won't provide any guidance, and that I should buy a new mouse from their store. They gave me a 15% discount code (even though I made it clear I don't want to buy a new mouse), which, even if I used to buy the same mouse I have, it would actually still be almost twice the price I paid for it when I got it 2.5 years ago, since the Roccat official store has a ridiculous markup for some reason.I did some research and it seems the new Logitech G502 X is a great alternative to the Roccat Kone AIMO Remastered, and no one complains about any recurrent issues on the G502 the way they do about Roccat's mice. It's a similar shape and weight to the Kone AIMO Remastered, has all of the cool features (such as an "easy-shift" equivalent) and is almost half the price. The more I look into it, the more I realise how disillusioned I was about Roccat. In fact, if you read the 5-star reviews on Trustpilot, you'll see that most compliment the customer support for providing replacements for faulty parts, including several mentioning that they've had to replace products more than once in a row! That's a major red flag that I should have seen.I've never been one to grow attached to brands, but after almost 10 years using durable, high-quality Roccat products, I considered myself loyal to Roccat. It's such a huge disappointment to see that the brand no longer seems to hold any of the high standards that got me to fall in love with them in the first place.With all this, as much as it saddens me, I know I won't be buying from Roccat ever again.

Review.Titre: i had a replacement mouse sent out and…
Review.Contenu: i had a replacement mouse sent out and it had an issue and i dont have an option to return

Review.Titre: I definitely do not recommend buying…
Review.Contenu: I definitely do not recommend buying any Roccat product as a gift. The Kone Aimo mouse, which was given to my son as a gift, failed after 3 months. When I contacted the company, they asked for the serial number, but they said that they had to provide information with an invoice for the change. Even though I said it was a gift product, they did not accept this excuse. It is definitely not right to shop from a company that cannot control the warranty of its products with serial numbers.

Terrible company with terrible cheaply made products.I've got the Roccat Vulcan 121 which continuously fails keypresses. Support doesn't even send a single key replacement when asked because: "due the covid-19 situation we are not able to ship replacement parts at the moment, I am really sorry :("What an absolute nonsense excuse.. Can't ship because of covid... yeah sure.Even worse is that they got bought by Turtle Beach.AVOID ROCCAT PRODUCTS.

owned 3 products, all broke within the first 10 months. Switches on the keyboards are made so they cant be replaced, this company rather have you dump another piece of toxic trash into the ocean than be able to repair their terrible quality.I love their design but they blatantly rip you off.

I have 2 mouses, a headset and had no issues with this brand, until i bought a 160 euro keyboard. Double clicks and miss clicks. customer support offered me 15% of their store, guess what Roccat I will not spend 1 cent on your crappy products again ever.

I bought Roccat headphones which was expensive, but full grabage, terrible build quality also they werent comfy, also the sound was shait. Never buy from this brand, everything its overpriced and you will recive thing that is like 40% for price quality.

Review.Titre: Stay Away from Roccat, horrible, known defects
Review.Contenu: Worst company, the mouse has known issues with the wheel Encoder and has a ton of people online complaining, yet the still sell their defective crap.  Don't buy from them, stay away.   Horrible costumer service as well.

I was stunned by the beauty of their products and bought their high-end products Roccat vulcan 121 and Roccat Kain (both white and black). The keyboard had malware problems basically tapping the "A" key once would double tap or not register the input. Making fps and MMO alike unplayable. I forgave them and bought their new Roccat Kain mice, which also had hardware problems, which was double clicking. I got a replacement in april and the new mice now has problems with the scrolling wheel. I took care of the products and if look on Roccat reddit it is filled with people complaining about the quality of the products, whether its software or hardware problems. I would recommed people check out the classic firms like corsair and Razor for mices and generally Razor and Steelseries for keyboards. Dont get pulled in by the looks of the products, they are utterly disappointing.Roccat support if you read this please contact me, if you want to remedy the situation.

Review.Titre: These guys selling high end products…
Review.Contenu: These guys selling high end products with unsupported beta format software .... pathetic guys

Review.Titre: Products are as woeful as their 'support'
Review.Contenu: Kone Pro wheel failed after 2 months and a quick Google suggests it isn't an uncommon issue. Support were responsive initially and arranged to send out a replacement. Except not to the address I stipulated and instead to one they made up which was invalid. I told Roccat that it was incorrect. They said they had updated their records and the replacement will be sent to the correct address. I then receive an RMA successful email from Roccat saying they will despatch the replacement. To the invalid address. I contact them again and they say their records have been updated and it will be sent to the correct address. I then receive an email from the delivery company with the invalid address on. The delivery company has now been sat on the parcel for two weeks due to the invalid address. Roccat claim they've told the delivery company the correct address yet nothing. Roccat then said said the item will be sent back to their warehouse at which point shipped out to me correctly. Still no update. I've advised Roccat that I'm having to use a work mouse at home as a result and can they refund me and I'll buy a new mouse. They've responded again saying they've asked the delivery company to send to the correct address again and there is nothing further they can do. I'm £70 out of pocket with no sign of this being resolved. Avoid at all costs. I won't buy from Roccat again.

The product is comfortable and lights up exactly as advertised.  About 4 months into owning it the scroll wheel stopped working correctly.  It would jump and skip when I was reading pages online or doing any work where I needed the scroll button.  So I had registered the product and was using the Swarm software with the mouse.  They responded within about 24hrs and gave me a list of troubleshooting directives to try.  They didn’t work.  I replied to their email and haven’t heard back in 4 days.  They only respond by email and there isn’t a customer service number to reach out to.  It’s under warranty which by the way is very vague and unhelpful.  So now I have a broken mouse, no customer support and I’m underwhelmed by their support.  Treat your customers right.  I’m buying a new mouse and it won’t be from this company.  Update-  they responded and here is what they said; Your product will need to be replaced under warranty.In this case, you do not need to ship your original product to us. To proceed with warranty replacement service:1) Unplug your Roccat product from any computer, controller, game console, phone, and power source.2) Take a picture of the products serial number. You can find the serial number either on the original packaging or on the sticker on the bottom of your device.3) Take a picture of the ENTIRE product in its current condition.  In the same photo, show your RMA number HANDWRITTEN (not printed or digitally modified in any way) clearly on a sheet of paper next to the product. 4) AFTER you have taken that picture, CUT the cable of your product using scissors, carefully.5) AFTER cutting the cable, take a photo that shows the entire product, including the cut cable. In the same photo, show your RMA number HANDWRITTEN (not printed or digitally modified in any way) clearly on a sheet of paper next to the product. 6) Reply to this email with ALL THREE images that were requested aboveThis is just awful.  I’m out a mouse for 14 days.

Review.Titre: Telling me to CUT my keyboard wire as support???
Review.Contenu: After buying one of their more expensive keyboards (vulcan Aimo 121) some of the keys stopped working after 8-9 months. either totally non-responsive or gave you 5x the input at a single button press.After contacting support, they immediately said to me that I would NOT have to send the product back, only to follow some simple steps and they would send a replacement, so I thought, that's very reasonable.However. The steps that they asked me to do was something I've never heard of in any form of warranty claim before, and frankly, quite strange behavior.Stated in the email was the terms; The product you receive will be delivered in up to two weeks (Not horrendous, but not good either)Then stated; The product you receive may be a second hand or refurbished product. We cannot guarantee either. (I thought, great! what a way to get rid of all their returns, hand them out to warranty customers! charming!)It goes on; Take a photo of you CUTTING the cord on the keyboard, to prove you have destroyed it...WHAT?! so they have already said they don't take back products, so they aren't gaining ANYTHING from this, but they still want to sting the customer by making sure the product is destroyed??? what am I supposed to use while I wait for this, possibly, nearly destroyed also, second hand keyboard? are they telling me I have to go out to purchase another temporary board to use while I wait, for not even another new board, to arrive?! This is insane. No wonder they have an awful track record on here! Warranty under almost 99% of any company will replace the broken product with a NEW one. They also dont care what you do with the old one, either that or they want it sent back to them!If ROCCAT are really serious about the customer destroying the product, why not just send it back and they do it themselves to prevent all this hassle???Really dodgy and weird business practices here. This is the first, and last time I will ever buy a roccat product, and i'll advise my friends to do the same

First of all, the hardware is excellent. Well designed and innovative with great ergonomics. I know from the many mice I've had that it's difficult to make a tilting mouse wheel that does not occasionally give errors on middle press - but so far this one is doing great! Hats off to the designers and engineers. However, the support staff are pitiful. If you want to waste your lifetime messaging what appears to be a chatbot, then please go ahead, but you'll find Chatgpt will give you a better experience. Even though I've told Roccat twice that action X is possible with the mouse, she/it keeps on parroting that it's not possible. I could send over a video showing what happens, but then she/it will just say I've edited the video ... or more likely simply ignore what I'm saying and repeat the same old nonsense. Just to rub salt into the wound, at some point they scrap the conversation history in the email reply. I guess this is to make it harder for you to point out "Look. I already told you this twice! Just see below!" Honestly, words fail me, with behavior like this.It's pointless. I've been here before with other companies and I know that now is the time to give up, try forget about the time you wasted on them, and just adapt to what you've got. You definitely won't get any help from them.Oh, and Roccat, if you're reading this, please don't tell me to respond to the last email about this. I'm not wasting any more of my life on that useless thing. If you want me to respond, give me a new email address.

Review.Titre: Durability issues with Vulcan 120 keyboard & KONE mouse
Review.Contenu: Brought 2 products for my Son. A Vulcan 120 Aimo Keyboard and KONE mouse (£200). Both items faulty within a year. Though both products were great and worth 5*, unfortunately the durability is severely lacking and given the price, that’s very very disappointing. Although I contacted Roccat directly first, they advised me that for any hardware issues I would need to contact the retailer directly and that even though Roccat provided a 2 year warranty, this may not apply in different countries (UK) so unfortunately, no help whatsoever.

Don't buy direct. My order took almost 3 weeks to arrive and was the German layout rather than UK.The respones from support were woeful, I was told to "be patient" in one and that all they knew was that a sipment had been sent to the uk from the Netherlands. Now I have to send it back and I can apparently expect to wait another 2-3 weeks AFTER they recieve it, so in total, roughly two months to get a keyboard delivered. Just buy it from any of the online retailers.

Have a key that's not registering properly (Roccat Vulcan 120 aimo) and I asked what I can try to do but they didn't want to help me and kept saying I need to contact retailer although I told them several times that I have no reciept so no warranty.Update: So I just fixed it myself this morning.Like the keyboard but this support was unexpected for such a high price keyboard.

I purchased a Roccat Sova lapboard in the spring of 2016. Within a few months, the left CTRL key and q key and a key start acting up. I can fix with compressed air, but the problems resurface over time. At the beginning of 2020, the USB cable starts to go; I’m losing connection to my PC frequently. One of the LED keys flickers like an old motel sign. Since the USB cable is detachable, I emailed support asking for a new one. Nope! They don’t have any parts apparently. A $200 keyboard that couldn’t last 2 years.

Multiple issues with Roccat. All minor but all extremely disappointing. Customer service could absolutely improve. Wanted to purchase more items from them but after my experience will be going with SteelSeries and Logitech. Much better companies and nothing but good experience with both.

Mouse did not work correctly out of the box. Dongle did not work but mouse did work wired. Seems the software is either a bit buggy or very poor documentation. Kudos to customer service for sending new dongle.

Review.Titre: Scroll wheel has major issues that should have sorted.
Review.Contenu: Used this mouse for 9 months now. When it works it is great. It is unfortunate that it does not work for long. The scroll wheel has a major design fault. I had the first mouse replaced because of this. While waiting for this to be sorted I bought a second mouse. Now I have two Roccat mice in still in warranty that do not work. The scroll wheel records both up and down movements at the same time. I will not even be asking for a replacement, even though I bought less than a month ago.When I looked to see how to fix this. I found, that this is a well-advertised issue that is recognised across many forums.

Got the Kain 100 a while back and Idk if it was just my luck, but it is janky as hell. The scroll wheel jumps everywhere, and it double clicks ounce in a while. The wheel is my Kain problem though as it happens just about every time I use it. It started fist day and it wasn't that big of a deal at first, but it is just getting worse to the point where it's about unusable. What sucks is I really want to like the mouse. The wheel and the clicks feel great to use in the hand. The shape is nice as well. If only it actually functioned properly

Review.Titre: Mostly used only Roccat mouse.But This…
Review.Contenu: Mostly used only Roccat mouse.But This is my 5th one witch goes bad and right click breaks.Not a single mouse has lasted over a year.As much as I love design and comfort of roccat .Its time for me to look in other options out there

Customer Service Great - RMA Process is appalling.    Roccat Vulcan 121 Aimo keyboard had a few keys that began to malfunction periodically.  Keyboard determined to be defective and replacement required.  Even though keyboard was basically functional (a few keys misfired periodically but keyboard was useable), had to cut the USB cable (wired keyboard) and provide a picture to customer service BEFORE an exchange would be initiated....a process that takes up to 3 weeks.  Meaning I was out a keyboard for that time.  Solution:  I went to a competitor to buy a replacement keyboard as I couldn't wait for 3 weeks for a replacement keyboard.  Roccat's comment about being keyboardless was "that's their policy".....  This has converted me from a loyal Roccat customer to a user of competitor products with which I am now quite happy.  Roccat's RMA policy lost them a multi-year and loyal customer.

Review.Titre: Will the Real Customer Service Stand Up?
Review.Contenu: Well. I originally deleted this response email because I was frustrated at the level of customer service being provided.I don't blame you personally, I wholly blame your Company's Customer Service Management and lack of genuine customer service training. My original email stated that my keycap broke and if you could point me in the direction of getting new ones.Not only did you not provide me with consultation on where I may obtain replacement caps, you basically said it's not under warranty so there's nothing you can do for me - so goodbye.I want you to know that because of your Management team's lack of support in any way, fashion or form besides looking up whether something is covered under warranty or not is abysmal at best.Your entire customer service team needs to be retrained correctly. When someone asks to be pointed in the right direction, someone from your company should have info to provide on where best to buy or replace anything on your devices.I also want you to know that my two children are Gamers and one is a writer. I was going to seriously consider buying two more Roccat Vulcans as well as even upgrade mine to your newer series.Well, your company can pretty much forget that now. You've lost 3 sales opportunities. In addition, I will never purchase another product from you. I never asked for a replacement, refund or anything...just to point me in a direction to obtain new keycaps. Fortunately, the Internet is full of viable options. Apparently, something your company cannot absorb or consult on as to best options. Don't worry. I won't disseminate your email response to me to the world. Not because of your company's lousy disclaimer. I won't disseminate your message because I'll just be  copying my message - this one to the world so that they truly comprehend the lack of customer service your company has. Again, nothing personal. But, if this is the kind of company you work for, I feel deeply sorry for your predicament.Please feel free to forward this to your Management Team. Hopefully, better customer service or even  a notable "gives a flying f***" may come of it.Goodbye forever,

While I cannot complain about the professionalism and Roccat's adherence to their own policies during the warranty exchange, I have to say it is wasteful and inferior to Logitech's options.Roccat makes you destroy your own product by cutting the cable, with photo proof, even if a small aspect like the mouse's scroll wheel is not functioning properly. This is very wasteful, as such products could still be given away or used by someone who cannot afford them.Logitech lets you keep the original products, and also ships you a new product.
My headset broke after a few months, they immediatly sent me another one in perfect condition. Great after-sales service, great prices, and good sound quality.

Review.Titre: I had a very good experience with the…
Review.Contenu: I had a very good experience with the customer service after I ordered the wrong keyboard layout. My wife absolutely loves the look and feel of the keyboard and mouse as it matches her new custom built PC (white shadow). The only issue we are having now is that the mouse keeps right clicking on its own which is super annoying and we will be returning.

Once I finally got a response to my inquiry the process was smooth and swift. Roccat personnel were very helpful and nice.I had to submit two inquiries to Roccat support about 4 weeks apart. After submitting the second inquiry I received a response within a couple of days. I do not know if that was in responce to my first inquiry or the second. Perhaps there was an issue with the first inquiry and it was never received.

The product is good-looking and the functions are great although the price is a little bit high.The keyboard I board has key cap peeling issues but the customer service is nice and quick.So overall a great experience.
The only downside i can see with this mouse is that the cable is bent so aggressively that it breaks out of its sleeve if you are not very careful.

Everything was great, the only thing I didnt appreciate is having to cut the cord on the old mouse... i felt that it was inappropriate and makes me feel I am not trustworthy... was not a good feeling for me.

Roccat offers good quility Products to afforable prices, which i personally am very happy with. The support is outstanding with quick response times and friendly messages.I am very happy to be a part of the roccat community.
Roccat helps me very fast with my problem

Review.Titre: Good products, even better customer service. 10/10 will buy again.

Review.Contenu: Great company, helpful support and quality products.

Review.Titre: Amazing support with real people from the start!
Review.Contenu: Had to contact Roccats customer support to replace a faulty scroll wheel on a mouse I bought from their online store. The customer support was quick and easy, with no hassle and a very quick troubleshooting and I got to talk with an actual person from the very beginning. Instead of having me jump through a lot of hoops, they quickly acknowledged my attempts at fixing the issue an sent a new mouse to me. It was a breath of fresh air compared to other companies exceptionally bad support.

I contacted Roccatt about an ELO air 7 headset where the bluetooth dongle had ceased to operate. As the headset was out of warranty, I expected to pay for a replacement, however I could not find any fir sale in Europe, so contacted them directly. Within two weeks I had a replacement dongle given free. Fantastic aftef sales care, evidenced by me writing this, as I usually do not bother. Soevial thanks to Sasha who dealt with the issue throughout. Please keep doing what you are doing. I would certainly buy from you again.

I contacted support due to my keyboard being faulty after only having it for a short period of time. I worked with Jack (Technical Support Specialist II) and he was nothing short of phenomenal. He was on top of everything, and I was able to RMA my keyboard. Within less than 24 hours of sending the pictures, he already had the replacement keyboard shipped. The replacement was delivered in less than 4 days. There seldom are places that have customer service reps like Jack. Roccat has always been 10/10 whether it be from the customer service to their products.

Great responsiveness to my issue. Replacement of a second deficiency product just awesome. I have used Roccats since the beginning and honestly gone through quite a few Roccats product.the mice wheels and buttons fail headphone wires break keyboards are solid though. I keep buying them because I love the product so having replacements provided when the fail is a big deal thank you.

Very easy process and fast. I did wonder what their process would be like for somebody with a usable but defective mouse and no spare to use while waiting for the replacement to come (they have you destroy your defective product before they’ll ship your replacement) . Luckily the replacement arrived within the week
They were quick to respond to my support ticket for my mouse with some troubleshooting steps. When that didn't work, they sent out a replacement product right away. Great customer service.

I haven't had any issues when getting my orders or any purchasing issues. Your guy's products are well made and I do appreciate the small details you guys put into your products. Your return on purchases are fast, the products all come in great packaging.

Bought a wireless headset in march, nice hardware quality, stress-free installation on windows and great sound. Lost the transmitter in June while relocating. Tried to find it as spare part inside shop - not available, so i called the support to ask about possibilities… got a new transmitter for free just a few days later per postage. Definitely 5 star support!

My mouse left click started to fail so I contacted support for assistance. After following a simple testing process they verified the mouse was failing. Then all I had to do was follow some final instructions and they shipped a new mouse out. Simple process and no hassle involved. From submitting request to replacement shipped was just 7 days.

Roccat Customer Service did above and beyond service.  Giving me information I had lost on my about my purchase and was able to replace my device.  On another device they were able to help me with troubleshooting 3rd party software that was causing conflicts.  Very thankful for their support.

I appreciate the support team for responding quickly to my inquiry about my mouse and its warranty. After I supplied the requested information, I even received email updates on next steps and when to expect my replacement to be shipped out. I was provided a tracking number when the product shipped and my mouse showed up as expected. I am impressed with the detailed and prompt communication.

We received a Kone mouse that would not click. They guided us through testing and repair, when it didn't respond they sent out another mouse with no problem!The mouse works great! At the time we also bought a Vulcan Keyboard and both products have exceeded our expectations! Great company!

Excellent set from Roccat. My mouse scrolling wheel had an issue, after a fast and reactive troubleshooting they managed to send a new one ASAP (within 3 days). I'm loyal to Roccat and so satisfied from all the products I ordered on Roccat.com (mouse, keyboard, headset).

I have contacted customer support 3 times. Once to ask a question, that was answered quickly. I had two hardware failures, one mouse and one keyboard, both were RMAed quickly and without issue. All three instances were positive and smooth.

Review.Titre: The Roccat Kone Pro is easily the best…
Review.Contenu: The Roccat Kone Pro is easily the best mouse I have ever used. It has always been difficult to find an ergonomic mouse that is both large and light weight, but the Kone Pro fits that mold and has been incredibly comfortable. An added bonus is the optical mouse switches, which should last much longer than mechanical switches, and is actually the reason I had to buy a new mouse to begin with (my old Zowie mouse started to double-click due to a switch failure).

I'm using Roccat peripherials every day. And I love them.The Kone XP and the Vulcan 122 looks and feels fantastic.They are nice, comfortable and durable products. The support is on quick and very good.Glad to find them.

I love this keyboard!I have been using my Roccat for over a year, and now all other keyboards just feel sub-par. There was a cosmetic defect in 2 of the keys and Roccat went above and beyond making it right for me.phenomenal productexcellent servicefair pricecan't ask for much more!

I had my mouse for a year when it started having problems with the wheel not scrolling correctly and contacted support. After a quick back and forth with to rule out software issues they put me in for a RMA. Some simple instructions and a few days later and I had a brand new (not refurbished!) replacement. Excellent support and service.

Review.Titre: Better than I expected and great support
Review.Contenu: I was looking for a new mouse and after two failed attempts with a competitor, cause the mouse wasn't doing exactly what it said in the product page, I turned to Roccat for a Kone Air XP Pro. I contacted their support team on Fb and made sure that the functionality I was looking for was supported. I got a detailed response and proceeded to buy the product directly.Once I received it and tested it, I was happier than expected, not only because it was supporting everything I asked for, but the whole mouse is great, fits perfect and lighter than my previous one.I had Roccat mice before but stopped buying until they had a wireless that fits my needs.

Review.Titre: Get surprised by the official support! Thanks!
Review.Contenu: Well, my cat liked to bite off the cable of my keyboard.So, unfortunately it´s not a standard USB cable, but it looks like that.Because of the lack of having a spare part available in the internet or the official website, I decided to contact the support.Got an answer quickly and a free spare cable in just a few days! Did´t expect that! GREAT!

Review.Titre: Best product on the market to my opinion.
Review.Contenu: The product are probably the best you can find in the market.I had an issue with my keyboard with some key, and support helped me identifed the issue and use the warranty for that and I had a fully functional keyboard that I use now everyday. and this has been done in less than 2 week including shipping!!I have the Roccat mouse and Keyboard and they are ridiculously good!!Just recommend this brand (at least keyboard and mouse) to everyone.

I bought the ELO 7.1 Air and the sound is great especially with super human hearing enabled.  My only issue was with running a fan you could hear the fan blades but was an easy fix with adding a foam cover over the mic.  Would recommend these to anyone.  My headphones cracked and Customer Support sent me a new pair with Proof of Purchase
Roccat support has always been super helpful. I just wish my Kain 202 wireless mouse hasn't had the same failure twice. However, support was able to ship out a replacement both times without issue.

Review.Titre: The scroll wheel would skip when going…
Review.Contenu: The scroll wheel would skip when going up and down. Roccat had no problem replacing my mouse after trying the steps provided first. They had me take a photo of mouse, cable, and cut cable the take another picture. Sent me a replacement and it's been awesome.

I experienced a few malfunctioning keys on a Vulcan keyboard, I contacted support to see if there was a possible quick fix because the warranty period had expired. The support was excellent, fast and to my surprise, they offered to replace the unit. Roccat even sent me the new keyboard while I continued to use the old one. I love the aesthetics and design of the Vulcan so I would have purchased another one anyway as it is truly a beautiful and efficient keyboard. I’ve used other expensive, brand name input devices that have also developed “sticky keys” so this can and does happen. The difference is that Roccat really stood by their product when they didn’t have to. Now that’s great service. They already had my future business, now they have my respect.Thanks once again..

Fantastic Customer support.Bought the product from Amazon, but had issues after installation.Was guided online from Roccat support… after test and trial, a new device was shipped, and everything worked flawlessly.
The mouse, keyboard, and headset are great for gaming. After a few months, the headset started to cut out and stopped working. They sent me a new USB dongle xmitter/reciever which solved the problem.

I contacted their customer service, since I couldnt find a replacement mic in EU on their website. They offered me a new one sent to my address, FREE of charge! This is how to make customers come back!

Review.Titre: Roccat Rocketed It's Way Into My Heart
Review.Contenu: I like Roccat quite a bit, and their warranty has saved me twice now (well, thrice technically). I had an issue with my mouse's wheel, and got that replaced for free pretty quickly, and my keyboard's key's started to get stuck on some of the keys and made typing and gaming pretty uncomfortable. However, Roccat was quick to help me with all of my issues.My only issue is that the company does not have spare parts for keyboards. My keyboard replacement's space bar was unevenly made, and my old key for the space bar would not fit on it, so I asked for a replacement of that key. However, Roccat does not provide individual keys, so I had to do the same thing that I had done before and get a whole new keyboard. Hopefully in the future, they create individual keys that support can send to people or offer replacement keys online.

Review.Titre: Fast response and very helpful with the…
Review.Contenu: Fast response and very helpful with the situation. Had a bad port in the keyboard and was sent a replacement within days. No questions asked.

Review.Titre: I had a pair of headphones that broke…
Review.Contenu: I had a pair of headphones that broke at the stress point on both sides.  With the 2 year warranty Roccat replaced them.  They were very punctual and enjoyable to work with through the process.  I wish all companies had the commitment and efficiency of Roccat with their customer service.  The world would be a better place.  The new set will have the same issue (It is a design flaw) but we have added wire ties at the stress point to help the plastic stay whole.  Thanks for your help Roccat, you did not disappoint.Frank H in Long Beach CA

I already own two mice and a lap keyboard from Roccat, and after my excellent  experience with their customer support team, I will be sure to buy more.  Wonderful products and top-notch support have earned them a customer for life!

Review.Titre: My headset stopped working - Good Support
Review.Contenu: My headset stopped working. The support has responded quickly to my request. It turned out that the transmitter was broken. I received a new one immediately. Now the headset works perfectly again.

Review.Titre: Love all the stuff we got from Roccat…
Review.Contenu: Love all the stuff we got from Roccat and when we need help with questions about exchanging and such, their representatives are very helpful, knowledgeable and take care of business! Thank you for a continuous great service and products!

Review.Titre: Excellent work thank you guys although…
Review.Contenu: Excellent work thank you guys although I'm on my 3rd mouse because they are faulty. I still enjoy the product and hope one day the product will be perfect in other words I believe in your company!

Ordered 2 good products for quite a great price and one of them didnt work cause of a phisical problem so i got sent a new one in just about a week and the customer service was also amazing. All and all worthy of 5 stars.
Shout out to Jack, who helped me through a mouse replacement. Really a great experience, and as a long time Roccat customer made it even better.
Had an issue with the USB connector for my Vulcan keyboard and got it resolved fairly quickly and easily. Thanks to the customer service team!
Roccat provides high quality products for computer gaming and they back it up with amazing customer service.  I've had 3 mice and 3 keyboards from them and I love everyone of them.

Review.Titre: Super helpful customer service & great experience
Review.Contenu: Got a keyboard from Roccat a few years ago, got some issues with the paint on it and they have immediately taken actions in order to solve my issue!Would definitely recommend.

*Excellent service from Roccat*I had an issue with one key on my Vulcan TKL Pro, it failed to respond when pressed, I contacted the Roccat service department, explained the problem and they sent me 5 replacement Titan optical mechanical switches within a week of first contact.*The board was six months old and under warranty*
Mouse was having hardware issues. After explaining what was happening. They quickly started the return process. Wish I did not wait so long to contact support. :)
My syn buds air weren't working properly, the support tried its best to help me without success so they offered me a replacement. Great support as usual :)

Review.Titre: Thanks for looking after your customers.
Review.Contenu: Firstly the products are great  that's a given.But where Roccat excel beyond other competing companies is with customer service and looking after you, going above and beyond what I would expect from any tech company.

I have a keyboard, mouse, mouse pad and mouse cable holder (bungee) all from Roccat. Excellent products, work very well, love them.I once broke my space cap in half. Wanted to order a spare one but I didn't see any option to do so. I decided to write an email to the support team - they just asked me about all the numbers of the keyboard (serial, production etc.) and where I bought it etc. And they sent me a brand new keycap for my space key - all free of any charge. It's true that the keyboard was under warranty, but still, I wouldn't be surprised if they told me "your fault" but I would still be glad to pay for the keycap - better than buying a new keyboard.Genuinely pleased with Roccat. Excellent products, hassle-free customer service. Roccat rocks!

Not only did they ship out a replacement dongle but they shipped out 2! I provided an incorrect address after just moving to a new house and they still took care of me after my mistake. Amazing and quick.
I am using Roccat like 10years. Consistency is a key. Mouse and Keyboards have an all around good feeling.Just Headsets are better from the competition (but my last try was some years ago).
Excellent Customer Service with fast replies.Roccat products have excellent build quality as well with minor engineering flaws: weight, sensor, click sound, etc..

Review.Titre: I purchased a Vulcan 121 and lost pieces.
Review.Contenu: I purchased a Vulcan 121 close to a year ago. Emailed the company because I had lost my wrist rest, and was inquiring on how to purchase a replacement. They just sent me one out for free. Plus I have a mouse, and headset from Roccat, and love them all.
The response I got from support was prompt and helpful. Defective unit was replaced and new one arrived in just a couple of days.

Review.Titre: had fast and very courteous responses…
Review.Contenu: had fast and very courteous responses took pride in there product and stand behind the warranty. Didn't have to jump through hoops to get everything taken care of spoke with one person only took care of everything

I bought a used Kone AIMO remastered with broken glidepads. I wrote the support and they sent me two new sets right away with no cost for me(no questions asked). I also had software problems with my Horde AIMO and they replied within 2 days at both problems. A great support.

We had an issue with our headphones so I sent a mail to the technical support. First response received within less than 20 minutes, entire topic solved (will receive a replacement) within few hours - super quick, super friendly and super solution oriented - this is what I call great customer service!
Short call regarding cleaning of keyboard. Got sent spare switches to replace with no warranty left. Thx alot
After encountering a problem with my roccate kone Pro air they helped out realy quick and replaced it once it was a sure thing it wasnt fixable.
I love Roccat. I will always be a little sad that the Leadr is no longer made because it had the perfect number of buttons but the customer service is the best
I had a faulty mouse button, and it was replaced at zero cost in less than a week. For me, that type of support is more important than the product itself.
Roccat support replied to my support ticket quickly and had the keyboard replaced just as fast.
Roccat replaced my faulty mouse, which was still in the original package. They took care of the problem quickly and without issues
Excellent customer service and very happy with the replaced mouse. Handled my request in a very timely manner and stand behind their products.
Our first gaming mouse did not work properly, so we reached out to Roccat and explained the problem. They promptly worked with us to get a replacement product.
The stuff they do is rock solid and perfect for gaming and more and their support is just awesome , best support I ever had so far !

Review.Titre: Replacement of the microphone seems to…
Review.Contenu: Replacement of the microphone seems to have fixed the problem.   Thank you for the prompt response to our issue!
I had a problem with keycaps on my roccat keyboard, they were really quick and professional to solve my issue.Best support ever
Great customer service! My mouse was having issues using the scroll wheel. I hit up Roccat and they instantly sent me a replacement!
I had purchased a roccat Vulcan 12 1 and after a few months the key caps had started flaking. I emailed roccat support..and they sent out a whole new keyboard.
All the co-workers that saw my keyboard (Roccat Vulcan TKL Pro White) said it is beautiful. Bought one for home as well.
Best customer service. Excellent Products.Made Me feel valued as a customer.I will be happy to purchase and use Roccat products in the Future.

Review.Titre: Great customer service very fast response time
Review.Contenu: Roccat has perfect customer service. Leagues above everyone else. Nothing about their process could be improved.

I love roccat’s customer service. Fast and easy. I’ve had a few problems with some products but still I know I will get the right service from them. Thank you roccat for the best products. Looking for some gifts from you guys lol Jk have a good day
Quick and easy to get a warranty replacement if things aren’t working like they should be.
Quick solution.Fast delivery.No useless friction.Prompt and good solution for my problem.
the headset broke because my head is a little larger than the average size. the replacement works great for my wife and fits her just right. thank you
ROCCAT went the extra mile. Super friendly and resolved my issue very fast.... They fully stand behind their product.
Bravo to customer support, they help me instantly without troubles, I guess you get what you pay premium quality of keyboard and also premium quality of support.

Review.Titre: A couple of letters started to…
Review.Contenu: A couple of letters started to delaminate.  Replacement keys were not available so they replaced the whole keyboard.
Excellent service. I was sent a new mouse for free under warranty because my last one had a scrolling problem.
I needed a micro-usb cable for a mouse that is no longer on sale and they sent me a new one free of charge. Amazing customer service!
Great customer service. Quick responses. Couldn't be happier with how they handled my faulty mouse.
Amazing service. She went above and beyond to understand my issue and help me out. Great I mean great customer service.

Review.Titre: Fastest and most helpful support I know
Review.Contenu: Had a slight Problem with my keyboard.Sp I sent the Support a Mail and got s reply on the same day containing the solution to my problem.

Review.Titre: I love the company it has great Mic and…
Review.Contenu: I love the company it has great Mic and Keyboard and Mice and al that other stuff but i really love it keep it up Roccat!
Needed some new Letters for my Keyboard. They changed it completely! Amazing customer services!
They honored their lifetime guarantee and replaced my broken mouse with a brand new one.  They did this in a very timely fashion.
Absolutely perfect and painless. Resolved my problem with zero hassle, Roccat stands behind their products.
Love this brand, will always come back to it for my PC needs! Excellent customer service and support

Review.Titre: Destroyed my mic on one lanparty and…
Review.Contenu: Destroyed my mic on one lanparty and Roccat immediately sent a new one. Very fast and great support.
Mostly positive, but add the functions keys (f13-f24) in the software already
Top service !! With my problem I was helped completely uncomplicatedly and quickly. So there must be a support !!
The paint on my Roccat Vulcan 122 Aimo came off. I contacted the support and quickly got my stuff replaced. Very Kind support.

Review.Titre: Solved my problem for good after a few…
Review.Contenu: Solved my problem for good after a few generic solutions beforehand which I already tried.
Extremely helpful and understanding. Listened to my problem and solved it quickly.

Review.Titre: Gave me a couple troubleshooting tips…
Review.Contenu: Gave me a couple troubleshooting tips and then sent replacement after they failed.
Great RMA process, the fact that I didn't have to send back my defective unit was a big plus.
The answer of the staff was quick (2-3days).The answer was well described and thus there wasn't any confusion.

Review.Titre: I've had a great experience with Roccat…
Review.Contenu: I've had a great experience with Roccat products - they are great to use, long-lasting, and customizable. I've also had a great experience with Roccat customer support resolving issues with the products.
